arabic: وَاِنْ يَّكَادُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَيُزْلِقُوْنَكَ بِاَبْصَارِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا الذِّكْرَ وَيَقُوْلُوْنَ اِنَّهٗ لَمَجْنُوْنٌ ۘ
transliteration_en: Wa iny-yakaadul lazeena kafaroo la-yuzliqoonaka biabsaarihim lammaa saml'uz-Zikra wa yaqooloona innahoo lamajnoon
transliteration_id: Wa iy yakādul-lażīna kafarū layuzliqūnaka bi'abṣārihim lammā sami‘uż żikra wa yaqūlūna innahū lamajnūn(un).
translation_en: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."
translation_id: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang kufur itu hampir-hampir menggelincirkanmu dengan pandangan matanya ketika mereka mendengar Al-Qur’an dan berkata, “Sesungguhnya dia (Nabi Muhammad) benar-benar orang gila.”

transliteration_en: Wa maa huwa illaa zikrul lil'aalameen
transliteration_id: Wa mā huwa illā żikrul lil-‘ālamīn(a).
translation_en: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.
translation_id: (Al-Qur’an) itu tidak lain kecuali peringatan bagi seluruh alam.
